a.text: High level process of a luminous mind

g.title: has fueld remaining?->spawn seed of consciousness
spawn seed of consciousness->has entered opening into 9th Jhana?
dwell in the cessation of perception & feeling
g.text: dwell in the cessation of perception & feeling

g.title: has entered opening into 9th Jhana?->dwell in the cessation of perception & feeling
has entered opening into 9th Jhana?->dependently co-arise context for consciousness
dwell in the cessation of perception & feeling->has fueld remaining?
dwell in the cessation of perception & feeling->9th Jhana:
dependently co-arise context for consciousness->dependently co-arise present kamma
dependently co-arise present kamma->establish sensory contact
was intent on 4th Jhana w/ requisites?
g.text: was intent on 4th Jhana w/ requisites?

g.title: establish sensory contact->was intent on 4th Jhana w/ requisites?
was intent on 4th Jhana w/ requisites?->dwells in line with causation
was intent on 4th Jhana w/ requisites?->dwells in 4th Jhana
